questions.oldquestion: Have you taken out a credit card or store card in the last 12 months?
questions.newquestion: Have you applied for a credit card or store card in the last 12 months?
questions.hinttext: A store card is a credit card that you use to buy things from a specific shop.

questions.oldquestion: Do you currently have a personal loan (excluding student loans)?
questions.newquestion: Are you currently paying back a personal loan?
questions.hinttext:
Personal loans are also known as 'unsecured loans'. A student loan does not count as a personal loan.

You're still paying back a loan even if you're taking a payment holiday.

questions.oldquestion: Do you have a personal mobile phone contract registered to your current address?
questions.newquestion: Do you have mobile phone contract that's registered to your current address?

questions.oldquestion: Do you currently have a personal mortgage?
questions.newquestion: Do you have a mortgage?
questions.hinttext: Think about your personal mortgage instead of any business mortgages you might have.

questions.oldquestion:
Which one of the following addresses have you been associated with?
(including ‘None of the above’)
questions.newquestion: Which of these addresses have you lived or worked at?

questions.oldquestion: How long have you been resident in your current address?
questions.newquestion: How long have you lived at your current address?

questions.oldquestion: Which one of the following addresses have you been associated with?

When did you last take out a personal mobile phone contract?
(including 'I have never had one')
questions.newquestion: When did you last get a mobile phone contract?
questions.option5: I've never had a mobile phone contract

questions.oldquestion:
When did you last take out a personal loan (excluding student loans)?
 (including 'I have never had one')
questions.newquestion: When did you last get a personal loan?
questions.hinttext: Personal loans are also known as 'unsecured loans'. A student loan does not count as a personal loan.
questions.option5: I've never applied for a loan

questions.oldquestion: How long have you had a personal mobile phone contract with your current provider?

When did you last take out a personal mortgage?
(including 'I have never had one')
questions.newquestion: When did you last get a mortgage?

questions.oldquestion:
When did you last take out a personal credit card?
(including 'I have never had one')
questions.newquestion: When did you last apply for a credit card?
questions.option5: I've never had a credit card

questions.oldquestion:
When did you last open a personal current account?
(including 'I have never had one')
questions.newquestion: When did you last open a current account with a bank?
questions.hinttext: Think about when you opened your current account instead of any joint, business or savings accounts you might have.
questions.option5: I've never opened a bank account

questions.oldquestion:
When did you last take out a hire purchase agreement?
(including 'I have never had one')
questions.newquestion: When did you last take out a hire purchase agreement?
questions.hinttext: A hire purchase agreement lets you pay for something in monthly instalments. You might have taken out a hire purchase agreement when you bought a car or a household item like a TV, fridge or washing machine.
questions.option5: I've never taken out a hire purchase agreement

questions.oldquestion:
When did you last open a mail order account with a credit facility?
(including 'I have never had one')
questions.newquestion: When did you last open a catalogue credit account?
questions.hinttext: Catalogue credit (also known as 'mail order account' or 'shopping credit') lets you pay for something you've bought from a catalogue in weekly or monthly instalments.
questions.option5: I've never opened a catalogue credit account

questions.oldquestion: Is your current account that was opened in MONTH YEAR a joint account?
questions.newquestion: Is the account you opened in May 2019 a joint account?
questions.option3: I did not open an account in May 2019

questions.oldquestion: You took out a credit card or store card in MONTH YEAR, which issuer was it with?
questions.newquestion: Who did you take out a credit card with in May 2019?
questions.option5: I did not take out a credit card in May 2019

questions.oldquestion: You opened a current account in MONTH YEAR, which provider was it with?
questions.newquestion: Which bank or building society did you open an account with in August 2015?
questions.hinttext: Think about who your current account is with instead of any joint, business or saving accounts you might have.
questions.option5: I did not open an account in August 2015

questions.oldquestion: You took out a hire purchase agreement in MONTH YEAR, which provider was it with?
questions.newquestion: Which company did you take out a hire purchase agreement with in May 2019?
questions.hinttext: A hire purchase agreement lets you pay for something in monthly instalments. You might have taken out a hire purchase agreement when you bought a car or a household item like a TV, fridge or washing machine.
